full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA THUGS RJE CHEN PO PHYAG BZHI PA'I SGRUB THABS RGYUN 'KHYER, MA nI'I 'DON THABS PHAN YON BCAS BZHUGS SO, ,
